query:
SELECT 
  'mercados' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(DISTINCT mercadoHash) as unicos,
  COUNT(*) - COUNT(DISTINCT mercadoHash) as duplicados
FROM mercados_unicos
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'clientes' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(DISTINCT clienteHash) as unicos,
  COUNT(*) - COUNT(DISTINCT clienteHash) as duplicados
FROM clientes
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'concorrentes' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(DISTINCT concorrenteHash) as unicos,
  COUNT(*) - COUNT(DISTINCT concorrenteHash) as duplicados
FROM concorrentes
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'leads' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(DISTINCT leadHash) as unicos,
  COUNT(*) - COUNT(DISTINCT leadHash) as duplicados
FROM leads;
